column4: hello all, do anyone knows how to fix my AWN bar in the "mac4lin" theme?
when type "avant-window-navigator" in terminal I have this msg "Error: Screen isn't composited. Please run compiz (-fusion) or another compositing manager.

2007-12-14T15:03:00.000Z	sharpie	hussam	so use compiz
2007-12-14T15:04:00.000Z	hussam	sharpie	how I've installed it and nothing happened or may be I didn't configer it right
2007-12-14T15:04:00.000Z	sharpie	hussam	are you -using- compiz?
2007-12-14T15:05:00.000Z	hussam	sharpie	how to know
2007-12-14T15:05:00.000Z	sharpie	hussam	Perferneces -> Appearance
2007-12-14T15:05:00.000Z	sharpie	hussam	then go to Visual Effects"
I've that msg "Desktop effect could not be enabled"
is your gfx card enabled in the restricted drivers manager?
that msg "your hardware dose not need any restricted drives"
how to know? it is in my lab top
i'm sorry, i don't know how to help you
never mind anyhow thanks alot 4 what u did :)
